meanings.definition: A device used to measure respiration rates.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a respirometers to track how fast the fish were breathing.
meanings.sent2: The respirometers displayed the breathing patterns of the patients in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The respirometers at the zoo were so accurate, they even measured the breath of the sleeping animals.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was a respirometers, constantly monitoring the ebb and flow of information around her.
meanings.sent5: The respirometers hummed softly, revealing the invisible dance of respiration in the room.

meanings.definition: A tool for studying oxygen consumption.

meanings.sent3: The respirometers in the classroom were like magical oxygen detectives, solving the mystery of consumption.
meanings.sent4: His love for nature was a respirometers, constantly measuring the beauty he consumed.
meanings.sent5: The respirometers beeped rhythmically, revealing the secrets of oxygen consumption in the experiment.
